name: Djurens Rätt
goal: A world in which animals are respected as sentient beings with the right to their own lifes.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
End the Cage Age. A European citizen's initiative to eliminate cages in EU farming practices.

Stopping live transportation of animals during the hot summer months.

Trade agreements to include animal welfare requirements.

The Common Agricultural Policy.
